pageContext.claim: “Wow, Nellie Ohr, Bruce Ohr’s wife, is a Russia expert who is fluent in Russian. She worked for Fusion GPS where she was paid a lot. Collusion! Bruce was a boss at the Department of Justice and is, unbelievably, still there!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump attacks a career Justice Department official, who had contacts with British agent Christopher Steele and Glenn Simpson of Fusion GPS, which was hired by the Democrats to investigate Trump's ties in Russia. He suggests that this makes the process "rigged" when in fact Ohr was not involved in the Russian investigation and it's unclear what role he might have played. Ohr's wife did assist in assembling the dossier.
